name: Code Review Checklist
title: Code Review Checklist
description: Checklists for security, performance, readability, testing, documentation, and architecture

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Checklist items enable verification of code quality and security
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: Accessibility and security items protect user wellbeing
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Explicit checklist items make review criteria clear
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Security and architecture items prevent harmful defects
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified checklist across security, performance, readability, testing

anti_patterns: Skipping checklist items under time pressure
Applying rules mechanically without understanding context
Using patterns as a substitute for critical thinking

items: No hardcoded secrets, API keys, or passwords
Input validation and sanitization for user data
Authentication and authorization checks on sensitive endpoints
